N\u1eb4NG<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Risemount Resort \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng<\/strong>&nbsp;t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Tho\u1ea1i thu\u1ed9c ph\u01b0\u1eddng M\u1ef9 An, qu\u1eadn Ng\u0169 H&agrave;nh S\u01a1n. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng kho\u1ea3ng 3 km, c&aacute;ch ga \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng kho\u1ea3ng 3,4 km v&agrave; t\u1ea7m 25 km \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nResort \u0111i v&agrave;o ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng n\u0103m 2016. \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n l\u1ea5y c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng t\u1eeb n&eacute;t \u0111\u1eb9p quy\u1ebfn r\u0169 c\u1ee7a h&ograve;n \u0111\u1ea3o Santorini thu\u1ed9c Hy L\u1ea1p, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng gam m&agrave;u t\u01b0\u01a1i s&aacute;ng trong kh&ocirc;ng gian tho&aacute;ng \u0111&atilde;ng c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng v&ograve;m m&aacute;i xanh da tr\u1eddi k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi khu&ocirc;n vi&ecirc;n r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i, h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i t\u1ea7ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng v&agrave; \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110&Agrave; N\u1eb4NG khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m 2018.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c 258 V&otilde; Nguy&ecirc;n Gi&aacute;p, \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng. V\u1ecb tr&iacute; tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng t\u1ea1i \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay t\u1ea7m 12 ph&uacute;t l&aacute;i xe. C&aacute;ch H\u1ed9i An 30 ph&uacute;t l&aacute;i xe.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n 5 sao g\u1ed3m 12 t\u1ea7ng. V\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u h\u1ea1ng ph&ograve;ng cho du kh&aacute;ch l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf theo m&ocirc; h&igrave;nh ch\u1eef T n&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u1ec1u nh&igrave;n th\u1ea5y bi\u1ec3n. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; trang tr&iacute; b\u1edfi n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t cao c\u1ea5p.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n 5 sao c&oacute; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ho&agrave;n h\u1ea3o nh\u01b0 nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng, thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n hoang s\u01a1, quy\u1ebfn r\u0169.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n* C&aacute;ch H&agrave; N\u1ed9i kho\u1ea3ng 155km, c&aacute;ch th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Thanh H&oacute;a kho\u1ea3ng 17km, c&aacute;ch qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 1A kho\u1ea3ng 14km<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Paracel H\u1ea3i Ti\u1ebfn Resort Thanh H&oacute;a (Paracel Resort H\u1ea3i Ti\u1ebfn)<\/strong>&nbsp;v\u1edbi 279 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng theo phong c&aacute;ch ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c t&acirc;n c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n tinh x\u1ea3o, \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o, k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng khu vui ch\u01a1i, gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, m\u1edbi m\u1ebb: Game center; khu vui ch\u01a1i c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c m\u1ea1nh; h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i NHA TRANG","tenbaiviet_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Poseidon Nha Trang t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n con \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Tr\u1ea7n Quang Kh\u1ea3i, m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb tr&iacute; v&ocirc; c&ugrave;ng thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n ngay t\u1ea1i trung t&acirc;m th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Nha Trang xinh \u0111\u1eb9p.&nbsp;H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 trong kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb ti\u1ec7n nghi v\u1edbi t\u1ea7m nh&igrave;n sang tr\u1ecdng h\u01b0\u1edbng ra to&agrave;n th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 c&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi, trung t&acirc;m th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c, qu\u1ea7y bar c\u1ea1nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i, ph&ograve;ng t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb \u0111a ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng, qu\u1ea7y h&agrave;ng l\u01b0u ni\u1ec7m v&agrave; b&agrave;n th&ocirc;ng tin du l\u1ecbch .<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Poseidon Nha Trang n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt b\u1edfi ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c \u0111\u1eb7c tr\u01b0ng ph\u01b0\u01a1ng T&acirc;y &ndash; t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n m&agrave; sang tr\u1ecdng, hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&oacute; t\u1ed5ng c\u1ed9ng 138 ph&ograve;ng, trong \u0111&oacute; c&oacute; 34 ph&ograve;ng Superior, 52 ph&ograve;ng Premier Cityview, 21 ph&ograve;ng Deluxe Seaview with Balcony, 7 ph&ograve;ng Deluxe Cityview with Balcony, 14 ph&ograve;ng Luxury Seaview, 2 ph&ograve;ng Poseidon Suite v&agrave; 7 ph&ograve;ng Family Executive. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i, tho&aacute;ng m&aacute;t h\u01b0\u1edbng bi\u1ec3n ho\u1eb7c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 &ndash; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p .<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"613\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/unnamed-1.jpg\" width=\"536\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"poseidon-nha-trang","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"0","icon":"1691575218_2.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691575218","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"14","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG","seo_title_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG","seo_keywords_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG","seo_description_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"},"133":{"id":"133","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"THI\u00caN THANH PH\u00da QU\u1ed0C RESORT","tenbaiviet_en":"THIEN THANH PHU QUOC RESORT","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p>N\u1eb1m \u1ea9n m&igrave;nh b&ecirc;n b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n \u0111\u1eb9p v&agrave; thanh b&igrave;nh thu\u1ed9c th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n D\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0110&ocirc;ng Ph&uacute; Qu\u1ed1c, Thi&ecirc;n thanh resort l&agrave; m\u1ed9t khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng cao c\u1ea5p ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n 5 sao. &nbsp;\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf theo ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb ti\u1ec7n nghi hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i. Bao g\u1ed3m 181 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; bi\u1ec7t th\u1ef1. B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng chuy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c theo phong c&aacute;ch &Acirc;u &ndash; &Aacute; v&agrave; nh\u1eefng m&oacute;n \u0103n mang \u0111\u1eadm n&eacute;t \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c v&ugrave;ng bi\u1ec3n. Ph&ograve;ng ti\u1ec7c, h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i v\u1edbi s\u1ee9c ch\u1ee9a t\u1eeb 40 &ndash; 200 kh&aacute;ch. Khu vui ch\u01a1i gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute;, ch\u0103m s&oacute;c s\u1ee9c kho\u1ebb, Spa, Karaoke, Bar &ndash; Caf&eacute; v&agrave; H\u1ed3 b\u01a1i&hellip;&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay Vinh kho\u1ea3ng 10 km, c&aacute;ch b\u1ebfn xe Vinh kho\u1ea3ng 20 km.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Summer C\u1eeda L&ograve;<\/strong> n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n tr\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng B&igrave;nh Minh, \u0111\u1ed1i di\u1ec7n qu\u1ea3ng tr\u01b0\u1eddng B&igrave;nh Minh. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n&nbsp; ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n 4 sao. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sang tr\u1ecdng, kh&ocirc;ng gian th\u01a1 m\u1ed9ng. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf cao 25 t\u1ea7ng v\u1edbi 250 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 sang tr\u1ecdng ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng 4 sao c&oacute; h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i th&ocirc;ng minh, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng nh&agrave;&nbsp;\u0103n&nbsp;\u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf tinh t\u1ebf,&nbsp;\u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng&nbsp;\u0111i\u1ec1u h&ograve;a hi\u1ec7n&nbsp;\u0111\u1ea1i&nbsp;\u0111\u1ee7 ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 600 th\u1ef1c kh&aacute;ch, l&agrave; s\u1ef1 k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p h&agrave;i h&ograve;a gi\u1eefa v\u1ebb \u0111\u1eb9p thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n v&agrave; s\u1ef1 ph&aacute; c&aacute;ch trong ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c, n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t, v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 sang tr\u1ecdng v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 chu \u0111&aacute;o s\u1ebd l&agrave; \u0111i\u1ec3m d\u1eebng ch&acirc;n \u1ea5m c&uacute;ng v&agrave; tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i cho du kh&aacute;ch.&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nM\u1ed7i ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb c&aacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, m&agrave;u s\u1eafc h&agrave;i h&ograve;a mang \u0111\u1ebfn c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i cho du kh&aacute;ch. Ngo&agrave;i ra kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&ograve;n cung c\u1ea5p nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 \u0103n s&aacute;ng, \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c, h\u1ed3 b\u01a1 ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi, ph&ograve;ng t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c .... B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh vi\u1ec7c th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c, qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch c&oacute; th\u1ec3 th\u01b0 gi\u1ea3n tr&atilde;i nghi\u1ec7m v\u1edbi d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 Spa
